name: Envoy of folly - arena
description:
This is a branch for main game that is designed to demonstrate you combat system. For better description of the game itself, you can go to:

Envoy of folly - episode 0.1

This combat system will be implemented in episode 0.2. If you'd like there is almost playable game at the link before.
However be warned - episode 0.1 have some obscene content.

For arena - use TAB to get moves description.
